Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: to bow down; hence: = causative action in which a humans or deities cause (other) humans to suffer hardship and trouble, ► resulting in a state of inability to help oneself
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to make a vow|to solemnly promise
Node.definition: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity ► to signal a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
probably a variant spelling of אַבִּיר (אַבִּיר) = name of God, stressing his great power and his exclusivity as the God of Jacob and his descendants

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sleep on
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
literally: eyelids; hence: = a poetic reference to the eye (עַיִן)
= state in which humans are sleeping relatively lightly; ≈ sometimes associated with being inactive
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
probably a variant spelling of אַבִּיר (אַבִּיר) = name of God, stressing his great power and his exclusivity as the God of Jacob and his descendants

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= town, also known as Ephrath (אֶפְרָת) and Bethlehem (בֵּית לֶחֶם) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► location where Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) buried his wife Rachel (רָחֵל)
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= town, also known as Kiriath jearim, Kiriath Baal, Baalah, and Baale Judah; ◄ where the ark of covenant was kept before David took it to Jerusalem
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= a low stool; ► for resting the feet on when sitting; ≈ often associated with authority

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= wooden box, overlaid with gold and with a golden cover with cherubs, normally placed behind the veil in the tabernacle or temple, but also carried along during military campaigns; ► symbolizing the presence of YHWH among his people and used to store the two tablets with the law of God and other objects representing important events in the history of Israel
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to be clothed (with a certain state)
Node.definition: literally: to be clothed; hence: = process by which humans or deities attain a certain quality or status

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of|because of
Node.definition: = particle linking proposition X to participant Y, by which Y represents the cause or beneficiary of X
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
literally: to turn away (someone else's) face; hence: = action by which humans or deities show their unwillingness to interact with (other) humans and honor their wishes
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

Node.gloss: to turn back from|to give up|to retire from
Node.definition: literally: to turn (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop being engaged in a certain activity
= offspring of human beings, ◄ literally depicted as the fruit of the womb, as if it were a plant; ≈ regarded as a blessing from God
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

= state in which humans and deities experience a desire to possess something, to live somewhere, or to associate with someone; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
= location where a community, family, or household lives
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= an adverb that specifies unending time
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= state in which humans and deities experience a desire to possess something, to live somewhere, or to associate with someone; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
= various foodstuffs, ► harvested, produced, or caught for human consumption

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= causative process by which humans or deities cause the desire of (other) humans to be fulfilled
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to clothe (someone with a certain state)
Node.definition: literally: to clothe; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans or animals to attain a certain quality or status
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before

Node.gloss: to cause to sprout|to make come up|to cause to bring forth
Node.definition: = causative process by which a deity or the earth causes plants or horns to come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= small container ◄ made out of earthenware, ► filled with oil (שֶׁמֶן) and with a wick (פִּשְׁתָּה) placed in it; sometimes placed on a lampstand (מְנֹורָה) used as a source of light (אֹור) ≈ associated with peace, stability and well being
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to clothe (someone with a certain state)
Node.definition: literally: to clothe; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans or animals to attain a certain quality or status
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= process by which a plant produces flowers in the spring as a precursor to the plant's fruit; ≈ associated with strength, prosperity, and splendor
literally: crown, diadem; hence: = state in which humans are in a position of authority
